review: This is a good/affordable product to satisfy your amazon prime streaming needs. I pre-ordered this when it was on sale, and it was delivered earlier than expected. Everything was very nicely packaged, as with most Amazon products, and hooked it up. It was a pretty quick set up (about 10-15 min). The interface is pretty basic, and easy to figure out. The only problem I had was the range of wifi. I tried using the fire stick in my TV room which was about 40-50 feet away from my router, and the connection strength was pretty weak. Other than that I enjoy this product, and I hope they continue to make improvements to the interface!
author: William Penn
